original_text: Moreover I will cause to cease in Moab, saith the Lord, him that offereth in the high places, and him that burneth incense to his gods.
korean_text: 여호와의 말씀이라 모압 산당에서 제사하며 그 신들에게 분향하는 자를 내가 끊어버리리라

sentences.original_text: Moreover I will cause to cease in Moab
him that offereth in the high places
and him that burneth incense to his gods
